scenario.data.tutorial_followers_blessin: Learn how to use <style="value">Followers</style> and <style="value">Blessings</style> to complement your Ability Cards

As you Explore, Battle and Level-Up you will acquire special cards like <style="value">Followers</style> and <style="value">Blessings</style>.

In this tutorial you will learn how to <style="status">activate</style> these Followers and Blessings to increase the amount of stuff you can do.

Don't forget that when activating Cards, Followers and Blessings you can always <style="status">de-activate</style> them if you change your mind (<style="status">Undo</style>) until you Move, Explore or Reveal new information.
Use the Follower description command (d space f) to activate a Follower effect that reduces movement cost

As you explore you can use <style="value">Leadership</style> points at various locations to recruit <style="value">Followers</style>.

You have a <style="status">limited number</style> of <style="value">slots</style> to hold Followers but gain more slots when you level-up.

Followers can be activated <style="status">Once per Day/Night</style>. You can also play cards to <style="status">Refresh</style> them.

Some Followers can help make Movement & Exploration easier by <style="status">reducing the cost</style> to move to certain Terrain or make previously impassable terrain passable. Find and activate such Follower.

Similar to Cards, Followers activation can be <style="status">undone</style> until you Move, Explore or Reveal new information.
Use the Blessing description command (d space b) to activate a Blessing effect that reduces movement cost

As you Level-up you may acquire Blessings. You can hover your mouse on the XP bar to see what you get at the Next level. Blessings are "always-on" powerful abilities that can be activated either once per Day/Night or Once per turn (don't worry about turns for this tutorial but in the main game a turn ends when you complete a Battle or click the 'End Turn' button). Some Blessings can help make Movement & Exploration easier by reducing the cost to move to certain Terrain or make previously impassable terrain passable. Find and activate such Blessing. Similar to Cards, Blessings activation can be undone until you Move, Explore or Reveal new information.
Activate card movement effects and use the Map description command (d space m) to explore until you find the village

For this tutorial you will have to explore a few times to find the Village.

Before moving around, chart a path and check all your abilities and Mana to see what you can use.

Remember that exploring requires <style="value">2 movement</style> points and you need to be adjacent to the space you want to explore.
Activate card movement effects and use the Map description command (d space m) to move to the Village

The goal of this Tutorial is to complement your Cards using Followers and Blessings so you can find and reach the <style="value">Village</style>.

You don't have enough movement points in hand, so make sure you study the board state to find the best combo and path to the Village.
